block.p: WEISSMAN-Kenneth. My love, my best friend and wonderfully kind step-father to Dan. I miss you utterly and desperately. It's our first wedding anniversary & has been the most interminable year of my life, every day 1000 years. I feel you deep in my bones, in every glance, each unendurable moment. The wind touches your bare skin one more time and you are gone. All my love is with you and I'm sending the pieces of my heart where you are. Audrey Shachnow-Weissma
